channel.title: Help with adding a npc somewhere?
channel.description:
can some1 help me with adding a npc somewhere.
can some1 give me a little example.
i am new at this, ty[br][size=1]Posted on: August 12, 2007, 04:06:34 PM[/size][hr]any1

item.title: Help with adding a npc somewhere?
item.dc:creator: @toonshorty toonshorty
item.description:
@toonshorty wrote:

ok…

first open the file “autospawn.cfg”

then add a new line and type spawn = NPC*

then press tab and put the X coords
then press tab and put the Y coords
then press tab and put 0 do this four more times
then press tab and put 1
then press tab and enter the NPC name…

*NPC is the id for the npc you want to spawn

hope this helps,

  • toonshorty

Read full topic
item.source: Help with adding a npc somewhere?
